caption.center: THE STATE OF WASHINGTON, Respondent, v. MATTHEW SCOTT ANDERSON, Appellant.

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division Two.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from a judgment of the Superior Court for Clark County, No. 01-1-01460-9, Robert L. Harris, J., entered March 25, 2003.

opinion_text.unpublished: Reversed by unpublished opinion per Quinn-Brintnall, A.C.J., concurred in by Houghton and Bridgewater, JJ.
